metadata.title: CVE-2018-18521 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
Divide-by-zero vulnerabilities in the function arlib_add_symbols() inarlib.c in elfutils 0.174 allow remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (application crash) with a crafted ELF file, as demonstrated byeu-ranlib, because a zero sh_entsize is mishandled.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18521` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1
libasm1 - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1
libdw1 - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1
libelf1 - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elfutils package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1').
